#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lld long long int
#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define in insert
#define mp make_pair
#define inf 2000000000
#define mod 1000000007

void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}
lld modu(lld a,lld b,lld c)
{
	lld res=1;
	while(b>0)
	{
		if(b%2==1)
			res=(res*a)%c;
		b=b/2;
		a=(a*a)%c;
	}
	return res%c;
}
//lld arr[1007];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	lld t,n,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>k>>n;
		if(n==1)
		{
			cout<<1<<endl;
		}
		else if(n==2 || n==3)
		{
			cout<<k%mod<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			lld val=modu(2,n-3,mod-1);
			cout<<modu(k,val,mod)<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
